author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HELENE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM AS IT MOVES FARTHER INLAND OVER GEORGIA... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, WINDS, AND HEAVY RAINS CONTINUE...
summary:
...HELENE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM AS IT MOVES FARTHER INLAND OVER GEORGIA... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, WINDS, AND HEAVY RAINS CONTINUE...
 As of 5:00 AM EDT Fri Sep 27
 the center of Helene was located near 32.8, -83.0
 with movement N at 30 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 968 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
